Reviews.Title: “Good deal considering the great location”
Reviews.Author: palghat
Reviews.Content: wife stayed days aug 913 2011 attached bath plus 1 50 yards pantheon 1520 min walking distance major sites 2 inexpensive hotel considering fantastic location dont expect moon 95 euros day 3 plenty eating kinds 4 quiet location 5 friendly helpful staff speak languages including english front desk round clock insisted breakfast checked 7 am 13th breakfast officially starts 8 fresh coffee coffee breakfast laid includes rolls croissants biscotti butter jam cornflakes milk coffee tea hot water orange juice 6 recently renovated toilet fixtures 7 clean sheets towels towels replaced day soap shampoo packs daily minus 1 barely view crummy wall opposite sleep night double bed extra whatever sleep 2 shower temperature erratic minute icy cold minute scalding front desk promptly leaped fix continued days sigh 3 mimosa accepts cash website impression pay credit card computer printout front desk claimed word deliberately connections credit card reservations im told resident rome policy common probably tax ploy confirm booking pay cash cash machines plentiful near hotel watch 195 percent commission cash exchanges listed print bottom exchange rates finding hotel dark green door 1ft 6in metal plate sign listing buildings occupants facing pantheon walk pantheon via della rotunda 25 yards pantheon building complex via di santa chiara third green door left sign invisible opposite coffee sandwich shop usually 6 am serves coffee 7ish overall id recommend couples

Reviews.Title: “Rome's Best Kept secret among places to stay”
Reviews.Author: Dutchboy3
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel mimosa rome 4 5 occasions disappointed location near pantheon superb prices reasonable staff welcoming helpful hm frills shared baths continental breakfast basic computer internet tv maintained clean looking inexpensive basic housing rome recommend hotel mimosa highly

Reviews.Title: “Nasty Concierge, Nasty Bathrooms, Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Leeya448
Reviews.Content: stayed location price heres friend finished 6 week tour europe throughout trip staying meager accommodations tight budget personal experience dont expect communal bathroom cleanest bathroom water flooding time showered rat sized clumps hair coming drain throw showering sick tea day tea hot water refused hot water kitchen rudest unhelpful concierges understand skimping amenities lower price hotel skimp decent person am torn location incredible dont lot time rome low maintenance dont mind treated badly hotel mimosa ideal sightseeing main priority

Reviews.Title: “Very basic but good value and great location”
Reviews.Author: SM-Bombay
Reviews.Content: rare hotels europe offer free wifi basic theres bathroom attached functional window looks onto quiet street pantheon location staff friendly relatively deal 80 euro night

Reviews.Title: “ONLY for the location, but what a location”
Reviews.Author: lhonor
Reviews.Content: unfair rate hotel mimosa lot amazing location steps pantheon clean deal neighborhood spent week umbria week florence stayed night flying rome dont stayed night anyway family basic beds pushed cot look hostel suspect cheaper 155 euro circumstances short stay centrally located night price rent pensione personal charms usually service personal little regular neighborhood feel rave hotel mimosa clean central conditional thumbs budget travelers basic expectations

Reviews.Title: “No, no, no - never again”
Reviews.Author: Ayla2010
Reviews.Content: husband daughters stayed nights 2010 picked ideal location offered expensive rates original impressions bathroom size clean tidy receptionist overly friendly chatty bags unfortunately stops therethe loud traffic street below air conditioning didnt reception staff offered assistance alternative choice windows warm stuffy baby couldnt sleep breakfast consisted types prepackaged breads watereddown juice familiar typical breakfast found italy worst wed encountered final straw husband pay bill 7am wake receptionist didnt grunt eye contact thank husband paid €200 worst hotel experience definitely recommend pay bit worth money
